header.title: Saami keyboards for computer and mobile phone

section.title: Keyboard layouts on the computer
section.p: For all modern operative systems (Linux, Mac, Windows) there are ready installed keyboard layouts for North Saami, and in some cases also other Saami languages. See the language and keyboard settings on your computer.
If you do not find the language or keyboard layout you want, you may also use the keyboards Divvun and Giellatekno have made for the Saami languages and for some other languages.

section.title: Keyboard layouts on the mobile phone
section.p: Giellatekno and Divvun have made a package containing keyboard layouts for seven Saami languages for Android and iPhone. You may download and install them for free. Note that the keyboards do not have contain predictive writing or proofing.
